Current Jobs for Accountants and Cashiers in Nigeria, February 2012 on Tuesday, 31 January 2012 Labels: Accounting Jobs Current Jobs for Accountants and Cashiers in Nigeria, February 2012 Our client deals on high end entertainment electronic equipment and appliances for private and professional uses representing a top brand that is a symbol of affluence in the world has retained our services to recruit exceptional talents who must be self starters with high level of initiative and drive for its Abuja office.
JOB TITLE: ACCOUNTANT JOB RESPONSIBILITIES/QUALIFICATIONS
•To manage the overall finance and accounts function for the branch and the Lagos head office; operating from the Abuja branch. •A chartered accountant with first degree or HND, •At least five years post qualification experience. •Will have oversight function over the admin and inventory mgt units.
JOB TITLE: CASHIER JOB RESPONSIBILITIES/QUALIFICATIONS
•Receipt and safe custody of cash and cheques. •Banking transactions •OND in accounting or financial studies or ATS with minimum of five years working experience or a fresh accounting graduate. Honest and hardworking, preferably a female.
How to apply Interested candidates should apply by sending their applications and curriculum vitae to: recruitment.kulabech@gmail.com not later than one week from the date of this publication Someone might need this,why not share or tweet it! Tweet
